sentences.en: A complete analysis must build on the implicit function theorem.
sentences.cn: 完整的分析必须建立在隐函数定理的基础上.

sentences.en: a mathematical theorem
sentences.cn: 数学定理

sentences.en: And then we have a fundamental theorem that gives us a way to compute this without computing it.
sentences.cn: 下面是一个基本定理,它给出了，无需计算积分就得到结果的办法。

sentences.en: By the corollary to Theorem 4.3, the origin is asymptotically stable.
sentences.cn: 根据定理4.3的推论, 原点是渐近稳定的.

sentences.en: His theorem can be translated into simple terms.
sentences.cn: 他的定理可用更简单的术语来解释.

sentences.en: I agree with the theorem that the best defence is offence.
sentences.cn: 我同意最好的防御是进攻的理论.

sentences.en: It is misleading to refer to the principle as an " energy theorem ".
sentences.cn: 将功的定理称为 “ 能量定理 ” 是会使人误解的.

sentences.en: Let us restate the assertions above as a theorem .
sentences.cn: 我们把上述的断言重新表述为一个定理。

sentences.en: Rolle's theorem is a special case of the mean value theorem.
sentences.cn: 罗尔定理是中值定理的一种特殊形式.

sentences.en: So, what does the divergence theorem say?
sentences.cn: 那么散度定理究竟讲的是什么？

sentences.en: That is the so - called fundamental theorem of algebra.
sentences.cn: 这就是代数基本定理.

sentences.en: The assertion is known as the closed graph theorem for Hilbert spaces.
sentences.cn: 这个断语被称为希耳伯特空间的闭图象定理.

sentences.en: The remarkable part of Karatowski's theorem is the " only if " part.
sentences.cn: 库拉图夫斯基定理的卓越部分在于他的 “ 仅当 ” 部分.

sentences.en: The theorem may be explained as follows.
sentences.cn: 这条原理可以这样来阐述.

sentences.en: Theorem g is called binomial theorem.
sentences.cn: 定理g称为二项式定理.

sentences.en: There are a number of alternative formulations of the reciprocity theorem.
sentences.cn: 还有许多别的互易定理的公式.

sentences.en: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.cn: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

sentences.en: This result is often called the integrality theorem.
sentences.cn: 此结果常称为整性定理.

sentences.en: To get an accurate sample of an event that takes, for example, 20 seconds, samples must be measured every 10 seconds according to the Nyquist theorem.
sentences.cn: 例如，根据奈奎斯原理，为了得到发生时间为 20 秒的事件的准确样本，那么必须每 10 秒进行一次抽样。

sentences.en: We call this principle a rule and not a theorem.
sentences.cn: 我们称这个法则为原理而不称为定理.

sentences.en: We now state the idea of the previous paragraph as a theorem.
sentences.cn: 现在我们把上一段的概念叙述成定理.

trans.tran_cn: [数] 定理，（能证明的）一般原理，公理，定律，法则
trans.tran_en: a statement, especially in mathematics, that you can prove by showing that it has been correctly developed from facts
